00033 #ifndef MSQ_CACHING_TARGET_CALCULATOR_HPP
00034 #define MSQ_CACHING_TARGET_CALCULATOR_HPP
00035 
00036 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00037 #include "TargetCalculator.hpp"
00038 #include "ExtraDataUser.hpp"
00039 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00040 
00041 #include <vector>
00042 
00043 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00044 
00045 struct CachedTargetData {
00046   std::vector<size_t> elementOffsets;
00047   std::vector< MsqMatrix<3,3> > targets3D;
00048   std::vector< MsqMatrix<3,2> > targetsSurface;
00049   std::vector< MsqMatrix<2,2> > targets2D;
00050   bool has_data() const { return !elementOffsets.empty(); }
00051   void clear() 
00052     { 
00053       elementOffsets.clear();
00054       targets3D.clear(); 
00055       targets2D.clear(); 
00056       targetsSurface.clear(); 
00057     }
00058 };
00059 
00068 class CachingTargetCalculator : public TargetCalculator, 
00069                                 private ExtraDataUser<CachedTargetData>
00070 {
00071 public:
00072   
00073   CachingTargetCalculator( TargetCalculator* cached )
00074     : cachedCalculator( cached )
00075       {}
00076   
00077   virtual ~CachingTargetCalculator();
00078   
00079   TargetCalculator* get_cached_calculator() const
00080     { return cachedCalculator; }
00081   
00082   virtual bool get_3D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00083                               size_t element,
00084                               Sample sample,
00085                               MsqMatrix<3,3>& W_out,
00086                               MsqError& err );
00087   
00088   virtual bool get_surface_target( PatchData& pd,
00089                               size_t element,
00090                               Sample sample,
00091                               MsqMatrix<3,2>& W_out,
00092                               MsqError& err );
00093   
00094   virtual bool get_2D_target( PatchData& pd,
00095                               size_t element,
00096                               Sample sample,
00097                               MsqMatrix<2,2>& W_out,
00098                               MsqError& err );
00099 
00100   virtual bool have_surface_orient() const
00101     { return cachedCalculator->have_surface_orient(); }
00102 
00103 protected:
00104                             
00105   void notify_patch_destroyed( CachedTargetData& d );
00106 
00107   void notify_sub_patch( PatchData& orig_patch,
00108                          CachedTargetData& data,
00109                          PatchData& sub_patch,
00110                          const size_t* vertex_index_map,
00111                          const size_t* element_index_map,
00112                          MsqError& err );
00113   
00114   void notify_new_patch( PatchData& patch, CachedTargetData& data );
00115 
00116 private:
00117   
00118   TargetCalculator *const cachedCalculator;
00119 };
